items.sentence: I thought Tom was interested in doing that.
I think you could talk Tom into doing that.
I think we shouldn't permit Tom to do that.
I think Tom wouldn't be willing to do that.
I think Tom wouldn't be tempted to do that.
I think Tom would be happy if you did that.
I think Tom will be doing that again today.
I think Tom isn't the first one to do that.
I think Tom is getting tired of doing that.
I think Tom has to be shown how to do that.
I think Tom has never done that by himself.
I think Tom did that, but I could be wrong.
I think Tom could teach you how to do that.
I think I heard Tom say that he'll do that.
I should've given Tom more time to do that.
Tom wasn't in Australia last month, was he?
I'm sorry, but your name isn't on the list.
Things will never be like they were before.
If you like here, stay for a few more days.
We've got to stay here until Tom gets here.
How long do you think we can stay in power?
Tom couldn't see exactly what was going on.
I don't like my brother climbing mountains.
The soldiers crossed the river by swimming.
Tom said he was going to clean up his room.
I knew that that was going to be difficult.
It took three days to paint the whole house.
It was a dry year, and many animals starved.
It was just last week that Tom told me that.
Tom is the only one who doesn\'t seem happy.
Didn\'t it occur to you to shut the windows?
Didn\'t you know that Tom is from Australia?
Tom wants to learn how to ride a motorcycle.
Tom wants to learn to speak French fluently.
Tom wants to see if Mary likes his new song.
Tom wants to understand the meaning of life.
Tom wants you to come to his birthday party.
I have a lot of money in my savings account.
I have nothing in particular to do tomorrow.
I have plenty of time, but not enough money.
I have something very important to tell you.
I have to change the batteries in the radio.
Tom told me that his father had passed away.
Tom told me that you like to eat spicy food.
Tom took off his glasses and wiped his eyes.
Tom tried to kiss Mary, but she backed away.
Tom could hurt himself if he\'s not careful.
Tom could see Mary\'s house in the distance.
I wouldn\'t have let anything happen to Tom.
I\'d like to hire someone who speaks French.
